entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: json, multiple_queries #43846
  • ControllerLinkGeneratorExtensions throws ArgumentException #43845
  • Changing Environment Variables causes error in Blazor WASM .NET Core hosted .NET 6.0 #43843
  • Blazor WASM Does not serve linked files #43840
  • Http1AndHttp2 should warn if Tls is disabled #43837
  • Http1AndHttp2 without TLS/SSL #43836
  • `dotnet new blazor` should be an alias for creating a Blazor Server template #43832
  • Pass through response status codes from BadHttpRequestException in ExceptionHandlerMiddleware #43831
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Make ReactDevelopmentServerMiddleware a more general-purpose middleware #43826
  • InputDate resets when typing 0 as day or month #43824
    .NET 8 Planning
  • HAML support #43823
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #43821
  • HTTP/3: React to QuicError.AlpnInUse #43818
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Security team claims .NET 6 deleted app pools in IIS #43819
  • Problem details JSON returned by developer exception page serializes request path as an object #43816
    7.0-rc2

Closed

  • Question - Blazor - Why is a rethrown exception not causing the developer exception stack trace page to be shown? #43800
  • Question - Blazor - Best way to narrowly scope ErrorBoundary #43798
  • Question - Blazor - Not all unhandled exceptions lead to developer stack trace page. #43804
  • Blazor inherited CssClass property is interpreted as an attribute #43779
    7.0.0
  • Typescript SignalR Client: Reduce error logging for failed connection. #43822
  • Minimal APIs can generate invalid IL when returning Spans #41920
    7.0-rc2
  • Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Server ignores minimal API endpoints #43391
    7.0-rc2
  • Update web API project template to use new problem details service feature #43839
  • How to handle route values in IApplicationModelConvention #43797
  • Version reference mismatch for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Localization assembly, incompatible with nuget #43828
  • [Blazor .NET MUAI] Not all CSS cursor properties are functional #43758
  • [Performance] GRPC #27223
  • Incoming connections can stop HTTP/3 accept loop #43723
    7.0-rc2
  • Ignore output cache entries with delimiters in their keys #43414
    7.0-rc2
  • Breaking Change in .Net 6 - WebApplicationFactory Bug with MVC #41195
    7.0-rc2
  • Severe blazor server memory leak #43221
  • asp.net core identity two factor remember me cookie being overwritten #43577
  • Render image for static files logged in console browser 404 #43613
  • `dotnet user-jwts create` throws exception in rc.1 builds #43726
    7.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43853
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • [7.0, Test only] Add Http/2 WebSocket HttpClient interop tests #43851
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • Fix issue with double dispatching on Linux #43849
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • Fix Path content in the Problem Details Json #43848
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Fix Blazor RemoteAuthenticatorView processing the same action multiple times #43844
    area-blazor
  • [release/7.0] Improve error message for ByRef parameter exception #43842
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0] HTTP/3: Improve handling of connection timeout #43820
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc2

Merged

  • notin -> eq for PostBuildSign conditional #43850
    area-infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43830
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • SocketTransportOptions: don't own handle to avoid close side-effects. #43827
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Backport LF line terminator support in HttpParser #43812
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.10
  • [SignalR] Avoid unobserved tasks in the .NET client #43545
    area-signalr, signalr-client-net, 7.0-rc2
  • [release/7.0] Turn in-build signing on #43838
    area-infrastructure
  • Update json-schema to 0.4.0 #43807
    area-signalr, 3.1.30
  • Default install Playwright to false #43811
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Update EF Submodule #43801
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.38
  • Update dotnet-getdocument to support minimal APIs #43701
    area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks
  • Update SDK #43802
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Add framework to gRPC template's dotnetcli.host.json #43746
    area-mvc, area-grpc, 8.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43783
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix Typos #42612
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Fix gRPC transcoding tests from bad merge #43817
    area-grpc, 7.0-rc2
  • Fix non-shared framework packages referencing transport package #43784
    area-commandlinetools, 7.0-rc2

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Add query parameters to gRPC transcoding OpenAPI #43751
    area-grpc, 7.0-rc2
  • [release/7.0] Fix NavigationLock prerendering #43785
    area-blazor
  • [release/7.0] Remove tagged keys as entries are evicted #43728
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, feature-output-caching, 7.0-rc2
  • [SignalR] Fix bug when combining streaming and client results #43552
    area-signalr, 7.0-rc2
  • [SignalR][TS client] Send ping on connection start #43695
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript, 7.0-rc2
  • [SignalR] Handle wrong type from client result #43670
    area-signalr, 7.0-rc2
  • [SignalR] [Java] Log 'WebSocket stopped' once #43532
    area-signalr, signalr-client-java
  • [SignalR] [JS Client] Retry HTTP request on auth failure #43300
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `1edf19d` to `ec91da8` #43761
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix ProjectTemplate test failure logs on helix #43789
    area-mvc
  • Fix URL building for SPA proxying #43407
    area-mvc, feature-spa, community-contribution
  • [7.0] Disable body streams for H2 CONNECT requests #43814
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Backport localizations for UseProgramMain string #43803
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, 6.0.x
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1987536 #43599
    area-infrastructure
